alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 27 at 5:41PM AKST until December 28 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions occurring. Travel will be very difficult. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches, are expected. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Until noon Tuesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting to 55 mph will cause whiteout conditions in blowing snow. Significant drifting of the snow is likely. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
